title: Remove Staking Rewards tab from Dashboard UI

requirements.summary: Remove the Staking Rewards tab trigger and content from the Dashboard while keeping Holdings as the default/primary view and cleaning up unused imports.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard no longer renders a tab trigger labeled "Staking Rewards".
Dashboard no longer renders the staking rewards tab content panel.
Holdings management UI remains accessible and is the default/primary view on the Dashboard.
No unused imports remain in frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx after the tab removal.
App builds without TypeScript/ESLint errors related to removed staking rewards tab UI.

file_operations.description: Remove the "Staking Rewards" TabsTrigger and its corresponding TabsContent (and the StakingRewardsManager import). Update the TabsList/layout accordingly (e.g., adjust grid-cols from 2 to 1, or remove Tabs entirely and render HoldingsManager directly) so Holdings remains the default/primary view and no now-unused imports remain.
